website_summaries.verdict: A sound choice for consumers who like the idea of getting 2 pairs for the price, though some other shoe trees are a better value.
pros: Made of quality red cedar and available in 4 sizes
You get 2 pairs for about the same price as one pair of other brands of cedar shoe trees we reviewed
cons: Some testers noted that the spring unit seems to lack the quality of other brands we tested

customer_reviews.title: Maybe a little small, but still a good deal.
customer_reviews.text: These do seem a little small, but not much. I'm in between sizes and usually size up with Woodlore, so any size difference probably didn't affect me as much, but they don't seem that much different. I do have nicer split-toe shoe trees, but these are good for the price. My biggest gripe is that one seems a little shorter/looser, but it may just be the spring, or even my shoes. It still gets the job done and I'll probably order more.
customer_reviews.author: rogun

customer_reviews.title: Good value
customer_reviews.text: Great shoe trees the fit well in my dress shoes and are easy to use. My only reason for four stars is that the springs aren't very powerful so they barely hold the shoe's shape. I like my springs a bit stronger so that they almost stretch the leather they are so tight.
customer_reviews.author: Brian

customer_reviews.title: Cedar Elements Combination Cedar Shoe Trees - 2 Pack (XXL)
customer_reviews.text: Cedar Elements Combination Cedar Shoe Trees - 2 Pack (XXL), I wear a size 13m shoe. The shoe trees were a bit short, meaning did not fit tight inside the shoe. I guess something is better than nothing in my Allen Edmonds shoes. Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works Like a Charm
customer_reviews.text: After reading lots of reviews for a bunch of different shoe trees I settled on these from Cedar Elements. I was a little worried about finding the right size but they worked just as expected. They smell great and seem very durable. I will definitely buy another pair the next time I buy another pair of dress shoes.
customer_reviews.author: Richard M Failla

customer_reviews.title: A little small
customer_reviews.text: I wear a 9.5 and the medium is too small. Very little cedar smell. Bought the large a couple months later fits better and good cedar smell.
customer_reviews.author: MM

customer_reviews.title: I have other shoe trees that are much better, but I also paid much more for those
customer_reviews.text: These seem to run smaller than I expected for my shoe size and are almost loose in side the shoes, so I add some extra cloth to keep them more snug. The spring mechanism seem a little cheap. I have other shoe trees that are much better, but I also paid much more for those.
customer_reviews.author: Philip Bar

customer_reviews.title: These are quality shou trees!!!
customer_reviews.text: Cedar shoe trees are a sure fire way to care for your shoes. I buy quality shoes & these trees will keep them “like new” for years
customer_reviews.author: jerry lawrence

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I expected
customer_reviews.text: Great fit. That's all I needed. Didn't smell the cedar as much as I would expect. But than if the scent was too strong, it might make my shoes smell? Now that is just crazy
customer_reviews.author: fobster

customer_reviews.title: Great And Long lasting
customer_reviews.text: Work great. I use these for multiple pairs of shoes and will buy again if needed.
customer_reviews.author: Linda

customer_reviews.title: Just as good as any others,  better value
customer_reviews.text: Just as good as more expensive ones. If you need multiple sets, this is the way to go
customer_reviews.author: lance w

customer_reviews.title: These work!
customer_reviews.text: These work great. Have several sets for my work boots. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Harold H.

customer_reviews.title: I don't like how the width is adjustable where the front part ...
customer_reviews.text: I don't like how the width is adjustable where the front part splits to get wider. Other than that. Good show trees and is made out of cedar
customer_reviews.author: Sbrownie

customer_reviews.title: They're great
customer_reviews.text: 100% solid cedar. Smells wonderful and will keep my sneakers fresh for many years.
customer_reviews.author: Chris Alan Wooldridge

customer_reviews.title: Just kidding about the napalm.
customer_reviews.text: I like the smell of cedar and napalm In the morning
customer_reviews.author: A Friend

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality and a volume discount
customer_reviews.text: Excellent quality and a volume discount compared to other sellers. A little undersized so err on the side of ordering the next size larger.
customer_reviews.author: Jim

customer_reviews.title: Great for leather shoes.
customer_reviews.text: I love these things. I have a lot of leather shoes for work, so I rely on them staying in good shape. These shoe trees are the perfect shape and help from getting deep creases.
customer_reviews.author: Juan Herrera

customer_reviews.title: Does the job but not as well as other brands
customer_reviews.text: Shoe trees are flimsy but still do the job. Shoe trees from Woodlore are much better but again they still do the job the way it needs to. If you're on a budget, these are okay but if Woodlore then pick them.
customer_reviews.author: Shirley

customer_reviews.title: Good shoetrees
customer_reviews.text: These are fine. Run a little large but work as advertised.
customer_reviews.author: joerob

customer_reviews.title: This will work.
customer_reviews.text: These are shoe trees. If you're looking for shoe trees, you could buy these and be happy enough.
customer_reviews.author: C. Monsterhouse

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and well crafted...
customer_reviews.text: Very sturdy and well crafted shoe trees. I may buy more.
customer_reviews.author: DRH

customer_reviews.title: Seem to be good quality
customer_reviews.text: Seem to be a little small for size 14 shoes, but they were the largest I could find.
customer_reviews.author: KingK

customer_reviews.title: kind of a waste if a shoe tree doesn't fit the whole shoe
customer_reviews.text: sizes are way off. too small. kind of a waste if a shoe tree doesn't fit the whole shoe.
customer_reviews.author: Syed Ahmed

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Decent quality for a decent price. I would order these again.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan G.

customer_reviews.title: Made in China
customer_reviews.text: "Made from US-grown Aromatic Red Cedar" Work well and easy to use. The packing box clearly states "Made in China." Don't appreciate the misleading advertising. May very well be US-grown.
customer_reviews.author: Vista22

customer_reviews.title: Nice shoe trees
customer_reviews.text: These are just as nice as the more expensive shoe trees, there is no need to pay more. It’s worth investing in shoe trees for your dress shoes. The large size fits my 10D shoes and the medium size fits my 10B shoes (men’s).
customer_reviews.author: Kevin

customer_reviews.title: Good quality but small for listed size.
customer_reviews.text: Good construction, nicely made from quality cedar. But... The XL size is supposed to fit up to size 13 - don't believe it. They're just barely snug in my size 12 shoes. You want shoe trees to be comfortably tight so that they actually impart shape and restore the form of the shoe after a hard day. These will barely do that, if I lace the shoes tightly. My next order will be for XXL's.
customer_reviews.author: RGMac

customer_reviews.title: Size off...
customer_reviews.text: The size seems to run a little small. Order up one size. I ordered 6 or so of them last year and added 2 more this year. I've got 11 pair of boots and I've got one for every pair. The cedar wicks the moisture out of the leather and helps maintain shape when not worn.
customer_reviews.author: Bull

customer_reviews.title: Best Value Trees Around
customer_reviews.text: Real cedar wood with solid construction. No complaints as product is exactly as described. I will be ordering another set in the near future.
customer_reviews.author: Chris Glorioso

customer_reviews.title: Would Buy Again!
customer_reviews.text: Great product would buy again! My old shoes were beat up and since buying a new pair and using these all the time I can already tell the difference. If you are on the fence, I would not hesitate to purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Blade

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Good fit, smell great, should help my shoes last longer.
customer_reviews.author: K. Campbell

customer_reviews.title: Exceptional Value in High Quality Cedar Shoe Trees
customer_reviews.text: Well-made genuine cedar shoe trees, and affordably priced. Fit my husband's size 10.5 shows perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Becky T

customer_reviews.title: Solid Cedar Split-Toe Shoe Trees
customer_reviews.text: Great deal for some nice split-toe shoe trees. They've been great for keeping my boots shapely, fresh, and mold free. You should have a pair of these for all of the leather shoes in your wardrobe.
customer_reviews.author: Jordan Crane

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I love these. Easy to insert and remove, Helps keep my shoes in shape. I have 4 pair and 10 pairs of shoes. I rotate them around and insert them into a pair of shoes after wearing them. Helps prevent odor and diminishes the new show smell, too.
customer_reviews.author: White Man’s Overbite

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Flattened out the creases in my coach oxfords, but my leather canvas shoes--not so much.
customer_reviews.author: manazonian

customer_reviews.title: Great Build Quality!
customer_reviews.text: Size large seemed to fit my 10.5 Retro 4's decently. Nice cedar smell and good construction. Will definitely but buying a few more sets.
customer_reviews.author: ItsBegger

customer_reviews.title: Nice Shoe Trees
customer_reviews.text: Love these shoe trees. Fit well in shoes and holds shape very well.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony Toliver

customer_reviews.title: Up and coming
customer_reviews.text: Super price, amazing quality and workmanship!! and the smell... nothing like real cedar...
customer_reviews.author: Edgar F.

customer_reviews.title: As advertised. They fit my size 13 shoes perfectly ...
customer_reviews.text: As advertised. They fit my size 13 shoes perfectly. Quality cedar.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Good solid shoe tree though the spring loaded stretching method could be a little more powerful.
customer_reviews.author: Hayden

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: These are a great value and they keep my shoes the way all shoes should be kept.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: They didn't keep the shape of my shoes like other quality shoe trees do
customer_reviews.text: Very cheap and flimsy feeling. They didn't keep the shape of my shoes like other quality shoe trees do. You can get extremely nice ones from other companies like Allen Edmonds for almost the same price.
customer_reviews.author: T. Jones

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: The cedar shoe trees came exactly as advertised. I will definitely buy another pair when I need them.
customer_reviews.author: M. Redfern

customer_reviews.title: They do their job fantastic, smell great
customer_reviews.text: Well made! They do their job fantastic, smell great, and look perfect in my Allen Edmonds.
customer_reviews.author: Ben

customer_reviews.title: Fake Shoe Trees
customer_reviews.text: These didn't work well to begin with and broke in less than a month.
customer_reviews.author: J M.

customer_reviews.title: Fabulous trees that came in the mail quickly. They ...
customer_reviews.text: Fabulous trees that came in the mail quickly. They are well built and the price was very reasonable for 2 pairs.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Ineffective
customer_reviews.text: This product is ineffective. It does not stretch the shoes at all.Will be returning it for a refund
customer_reviews.author: Jackaranda

product_meta.title: Cedar Elements Combination Cedar Shoe Trees - 2 Pack (Large)
product_meta.description: Size:LargeProtect your footwear and increase the life of your investment with this shoe tree. Made from Aromatic Red Cedar in a design that allows for length and toe width adjustment. Aromatic Red Cedar absorbs moisture while keeping your shoe in the perfect shape. Sold in a pack of two pairs. Steel hardware is plated with brass. Light sanding renews the aromatic scent.
feature_bullets: Made from US-grown Aromatic Red Cedar
Adjustable split toe and overhang heel to keep the shoes in its original shape
Protects against insects, moths, mildew and mustiness
Beautiful wood grain and aromatic wood smell
Large fits US Man size 10-11 ( based on “E” Width)

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.6 out of 5 stars138 ratings4.6 out of 5 stars
